T02D3409:73b-1: a'arya kharsa p'a ni lo ke shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3409:73b-3: 'phags pa kharsa p'a ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3409:73b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3409:73b-5: dang po re zhig sngags pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3409:73b-6: zhal bsang ba la sogs pa byas shing /
T02D3409:73b-7: sbyangs nas rang gi snying gar aa yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3409:73b-8: de'i steng du hr'i:yig dkar po /
T02D3409:73b-9: de'i 'od zer gyis mdun gyi nam mkha'i mthil du bla ma dang /
T02D3409:73b-11: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams spyan drangs nas /
T02D3409:73b-12: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i
T02D3409:73b-13: mchod pa'i sprin tshogs rnams kyis yang dag par mchod
T02D3409:73b-14: nas / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3409:73b-15: de nas stong pa nyid du bsgoms te /
T02D3409:73b-16: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa
T02D3409:73b-17: a'atma ko& ham zhes pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D3409:73b-18: // de nas sngon bzhin du hr'i:yig rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D3409:73b-19: nam mkha'i mthil du spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim
T02D3409:73b-20: pas de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi
T02D3409:73b-21: bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3409:73b-22: 'od zer dkar po bye ba dang ldan pa ral pa'i cod pan can /
T02D3409:73b-23: 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3409:73b-24: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3409:73b-25: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
T02D3409:73b-28: g-yas phyogs logs na 'phags ma sgrol ma dang /
T02D3409:73b-29: nor bzangs gzhon nu gnyis so //
T02D3409:73b-30: g-yon gyi logs na khro gnyer can dang rta mgrin gnyis so //
T02D3409:73b-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bor aom yig
T02D3409:73b-32: / mgrin par a'a:yig / snying gar h'um yig bsgoms
T02D3409:73b-33: la ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du'o //
T02D3409:73b-34: skyo na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3409:73b-36: aom hr'i:sv'a h'a zhes pa ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kharsa p'a ni'i sgrub thabs so //
